name: Unbank
description:
A passive music experience made for a school project to test out audioreaction. 

Music: Unbank by Plaid, from the album Scintilli (used with permission)

School assignment, ESA St-Luc Brussels / Digital Art department

Plaid: http://www.plaid.co.uk/

ESA St.Luc: http://www.stluc-bruxelles-esa.be/
